languages.text: "Мы близко! Я почти чувствую ручку двери под своей ладонью... Что? Да, слышу вас, шепотки родименькие, ведите нас!"
"We're close! I can almost feel the door handle in my hand... What? Yes, yes, I hear you, my sweet whispers, just guide us, please!"
languages.original_text: "Мы близко! Я почти чувствую ручку двери под своей ладонью... Что? Да, слышу вас, шепотки родименькие, ведите нас!"

traits.locale_text: "We're close! I can almost feel the door handle in my hand... What? Yes, yes, I hear you, my sweet whispers, just guide us, please!"
"We're close! I can almost feel the door handle in my hand... What? Yes, yes, I hear you, my sweet whispers, just guide us, please!"
"We're close! I can almost feel the door handle in my hand... What? Yes, yes, I hear you, my sweet whispers, just guide us, please!"
"We're close! I can almost feel the door handle in my hand... What? Yes, yes, I hear you, my sweet whispers, just guide us, please!"
"We're close! I can almost feel the door handle in my hand... What? Yes, yes, I hear you, my sweet whispers, just guide us, please!"

languages.text: “已经很近了！我几乎已经能感觉到门把手了……怎么了？没错，没错，我听到你们的声音了，我亲爱的低语。为我们指路吧，拜托啦！”
languages.original_text: "We're close! I can almost feel the door handle in my hand... What? Yes, yes, I hear you, my sweet whispers, just guide us, please!"

traits.locale_text: “已经很近了！我几乎已经能感觉到门把手了……怎么了？没错，没错，我听到你们的声音了，我亲爱的低语。为我们指路吧，拜托啦！”

languages.text: «¡Estamos cerca! Ya casi siento el pomo de la puerta en mi mano... ¿Qué? Sí, sí, os oigo, mis dulces susurros. ¡Por favor, guiadnos!».
languages.original_text: "We're close! I can almost feel the door handle in my hand... What? Yes, yes, I hear you, my sweet whispers, just guide us, please!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Estamos cerca! Ya casi siento el pomo de la puerta en mi mano... ¿Qué? Sí, sí, os oigo, mis dulces susurros. ¡Por favor, guiadnos!».

languages.text: "Wir sind ganz nah! Ich kann die Türklinke schon fast in meiner Hand spüren ... Was? Ja, ja, ich höre Euch, meine süßen Flüsterer, führt uns einfach, bitte!"
languages.original_text: "We're close! I can almost feel the door handle in my hand... What? Yes, yes, I hear you, my sweet whispers, just guide us, please!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind ganz nah! Ich kann die Türklinke schon fast in meiner Hand spüren ... Was? Ja, ja, ich höre Euch, meine süßen Flüsterer, führt uns einfach, bitte!"

languages.text: 「もうすぐだわ！扉の取っ手の感触が手に伝わってくる…何？ええ、ええ、そうね聞こえるわ。あなたたちの囁きが！あたいたちを導いてちょうだい！」
languages.original_text: "We're close! I can almost feel the door handle in my hand... What? Yes, yes, I hear you, my sweet whispers, just guide us, please!"

traits.locale_text: 「もうすぐだわ！扉の取っ手の感触が手に伝わってくる…何？ええ、ええ、そうね聞こえるわ。あなたたちの囁きが！あたいたちを導いてちょうだい！」

languages.text: « Nous approchons ! Je sens presque la poignée de la porte dans ma main... Comment ? Oui, oui, je vous entends, mes petits murmures. Guidez-nous, je vous en supplie ! »
languages.original_text: "We're close! I can almost feel the door handle in my hand... What? Yes, yes, I hear you, my sweet whispers, just guide us, please!"

traits.locale_text: « Nous approchons ! Je sens presque la poignée de la porte dans ma main... Comment ? Oui, oui, je vous entends, mes petits murmures. Guidez-nous, je vous en supplie ! »

languages.text: "Çok yaklaştık! Kapının kulpunu avuçlarımda hissedebiliyorum. Ne? Evet, evet. Kulaklarımı yönlendiren tatlı fısıltılarım, bize yol gösterin!"
languages.original_text: "We're close! I can almost feel the door handle in my hand... What? Yes, yes, I hear you, my sweet whispers, just guide us, please!"

traits.locale_text: "Çok yaklaştık! Kapının kulpunu avuçlarımda hissedebiliyorum. Ne? Evet, evet. Tatlı fısıltılar kulaklarımı şenlendiriyor, bize yol gösterin!"
